Posts.Content: Hi I had a WLE and SNB a couple of weeks ago and felt I could have gone back to work after a week but now things are kicking in, pain, swelling and my emotional state has gone from very high to very low. Take it a day at a time, I am very lucky my company are brilliant and say see how you feel and take it a day at a time. Good Luck, I promise you the operation will be fine x
Posts.Title: Off work

Posts.Content: my friend is having chemo and swears by a spoon of Makuha (not sure if that is spelt correctly) strength 15, she hates honey but has a spoon of it each day and her mouth has no ulcers at all. She buys it from the internet but I saw it in Morrisons the other day and the correct strenght....its a bit pricey though Hope all went well x
